town_square.name: Town Square
town_square.description: The heart of the town, bustling with activity. Cobblestone streets lead in all directions, and the familiar sounds of commerce fill the air.
ambient_description: You feel safer in the town's protective walls.
The town guard keeps a watchful eye on everyone.

deep_forest.name: Deep Forest
deep_forest.description: Dense woodland stretches in all directions. Ancient trees loom overhead, their branches filtering the sunlight into dancing patterns. The air is thick with the scent of moss and decay.
ambient_description: The trees loom overhead, and you sense danger.
You hear rustling in the bushes...
Shadows move between the ancient trunks.
The forest feels alive with unseen threats.

abandoned_ruins.name: Abandoned Ruins
abandoned_ruins.description: Crumbling stone structures hint at a forgotten civilization. Vines have reclaimed much of the architecture, and strange symbols are carved into weathered walls.
ambient_description: Ancient stones tell stories of a bygone era.
You sense powerful magic lingering in the air.
Your footsteps echo strangely in this place.
Something valuable might be hidden here.

crystal_cave.name: Crystal Cave
crystal_cave.description: A natural cavern filled with luminescent crystals that pulse with inner light. The walls sparkle with embedded gems, and the air hums with mystical energy.
ambient_description: Crystals pulse with ethereal light around you.
The cave hums with mystical energy.
Beautiful formations catch and reflect light.
You feel magic flowing through this place.

clear.description: The sky is clear and visibility is excellent.

overcast.description: Clouds cover the sky, casting everything in muted light.

stormy.description: Rain falls heavily and lightning illuminates the dark clouds.

foggy.description: Thick fog reduces visibility to just a few feet.

dawn.description: The first light of dawn creeps across the landscape.

morning.description: The sun climbs higher, bringing warmth and clarity.

afternoon.description: The sun reaches its peak, bathing everything in bright light.

evening.description: The sun begins to set, casting long shadows.

night.description: Darkness has fallen, and only the moon provides light.

midnight.description: The dead of night, when most sensible folk are asleep.
